players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "I believe Charlie is the mafioso based on my investigation. We should vote for him."
Diana: "Bob, can you explain what made you suspect Charlie? It seems sudden to accuse without details."
Diana: "Bob, your sudden accusation of Charlie without clear evidence feels rushed. Can you share what your investigation revealed specifically? Transparency is vital for trust."

Charlie: "Bob, your claim feels rushed and lacks concrete proof. If you’re the detective, why not share your full findings openly so we all understand? Accusing me without details only sows confusion."
You: "I stand by my investigation—Charlie is the mafioso. We must vote for him now to protect the town and end the threat."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
